title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister foreign affair minister defence) order 2024

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
heading: 2. Charlotte Simpson, particulars whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Charlotte Simpson, particulars whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign Affairs with effect from 20 
November 2023.
text_norm: 2 charlotte simpson particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair effect 20 november 2023

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
heading: 3. Charlotte Simpson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Charlotte Simpson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence with effect from 20 
November 2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
27 March, 2024. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [157] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
